title: How to Get the Swift Sail in The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD

steps.headline: Beat the Dragon Roost Cavern.
steps.description: This is the first dungeon in the game, and you have to beat it before you can get the Swift Sail.

steps.headline: Sail to Windfall Island when it's nighttime.
Go to the Hall of Wealth.
Participate in a bidding.
steps.description: The Swift Sail may not be the first item up for bids, but it will eventually turn up.

steps.headline: To win the bid, you have to press the A button repeatedly to fill up a meter, and then decide how much money you want to bid.
steps.description: If you bid high enough, the other bidders will be stunned and unable to bid. Win the bid when the Swift Sail is on auction, and you'll get it.

steps.headline: Go to the King of Red Lions, and you'll be able to sail with the Swift Sail.

text: Beat the Dragon Roost Cavern. This is the first dungeon in the game, and you have to beat it before you can get the Swift Sail. Sail to Windfall Island when it's nighttime.  Go to the Hall of Wealth.  Participate in a bidding. The Swift Sail may not be the first item up for bids, but it will eventually turn up. To win the bid, you have to press the A button repeatedly to fill up a meter, and then decide how much money you want to bid. If you bid high enough, the other bidders will be stunned and unable to bid. Win the bid when the Swift Sail is on auction, and you'll get it. Go to the King of Red Lions, and you'll be able to sail with the Swift Sail.
